changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "tb_device" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "updated_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "user_id" UUID NOT NULL, "name" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "fingerprint" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, "platform" VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, "push_token" TEXT NULL, "is_active" BOOLEAN NOT NULL, "brand" VARCHAR(50) NULL, "model" VARCHAR(50) NULL, "metadata" JSONB NULL, --- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("user_id") REFERENCES "tb_user"("id") ON DELETE CASCADE );
